name: Watched and Video-Time Overlay Background Color
description: Adds a background color to the Watched and video-time overlay on the videos thumbnail so that it is easier to read. Sorry for the shitty screenshot. Requirements - Chrome extension YouTube Center(TamperMonkey Userscript) - Latest DEV version - Found HERE Fade+ Style By: macsy - Found HERE
additional_info: Changelog - v1.0 - Initial Release Adds a black background behind the "Watched" and "Video Time" overlay in order to be able to read them. That's it.... Notes - I created this style because I am using the Youtube Center extension along with the Fade+ style found HERE and it caused the overlay to be extremely hard to read.
